debugs.debugresetcache: Avoids current cache an regenerates it.
debugs.debugnolang: Disables all translations and prints keys.
debugs.debugmemcached: Prompts in HTML comments cache keys used by memcached.
debugs.debugforcedbinstall: When system is flagged as installed or given conditions avoid database installation, this debug forces it.
debugs.debugdbemulation: Generates every DDL and DML query to upgrade the database and displays them, but runs nothing.
debugs.debugdbupgrade: Displays every DDL and DML query it runs during database upgraded.
debugs.debugmemcache: Prompts in HTML comments cache keys used by memcache.
debugs.debugphpinfo: Prompts PHP information, in other words 'phpinfo()'.
debugs.debugpaths: Prompts every searched path and how it was solved.
debugs.debugloader: Show the location of each class loaded through a SuperLoader setting.
